## ðŸ§ª Validation

### For ONTODYNAMICS Extensions:
- [ ] Derives explicitly from CMI structure
- [ ] Uses correct operator terminology (diff/diss/fix)
- [ ] Distinguishes Monos (ontology) from Logos (models)
- [ ] Includes falsifiable predictions
- [ ] References CORE principles
- [ ] Valid YAML syntax (run: `yamllint path/to/file.yaml`)

### For Articles (H & M):
- [ ] Both H and M versions included (or M-version references existing H)
- [ ] Semantic equivalence between versions
- [ ] Explicit links to CORE in M-version
- [ ] Metadata includes version and dependencies

### For Documentation:
- [ ] Accurate representation of CORE principles
- [ ] Clear, accessible language
- [ ] No contradictions with existing docs

### For Bug Fixes:
- [ ] Issue clearly identified
- [ ] Fix tested and validated
- [ ] No unintended side effects
